gen:link.msg:message: `BalanceIncomeAndExpenses` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de onderliggende waarden. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ContinuityParagraphConsolidatedIncomeExpensesStatementEducation_PrtSumOfChildrenParentCredit2_BalanceIncomeAndExpenses')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ContinuityParagraphConsolidatedIncomeExpensesStatementEducation_PrtSumOfChildrenParentCredit2_BalanceIncomeAndExpenses return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ContinuityParagraphConsolidatedIncomeExpensesStatementEducation_PrtSumOfChildrenParentCredit2_ChildrenOfBalanceIncomeAndExpensesCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ContinuityParagraphConsolidatedIncomeExpensesStatementEducation_PrtSumOfChildrenParentCredit2_ChildrenOfBalanceIncomeAndExpensesCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ContinuityParagraphConsolidatedIncomeExpensesStatementEducation_PrtSumOfChildrenParentCredit2_ChildrenOfBalanceIncomeAndExpensesDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ContinuityParagraphConsolidatedIncomeExpensesStatementEducation_PrtSumOfChildrenParentCredit2_ChildrenOfBalanceIncomeAndExpensesDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
